statements: SELECT * FROM product_pricing ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 50;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_pricing GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT product_name, price, sale_date FROM product_pricing WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price FROM product_pricing;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, vendor_id, sale_date FROM product_pricing WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_pricing WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND price < 50 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM product_pricing WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY vendor_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(total_price) AS avg_price FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_price < 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT p.name, s.quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 10 GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY s.quantity DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, s.quantity AS sale_quantity, s.total_price AS total_sale_price FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, SUM(s.quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 50 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT customer_name, sale_date, product_name, price FROM customers INNER JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON sales.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_date >= '2022-03-01' AND sale_date < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY sale_date ASC, customer_name DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM product_prices;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_prices WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_name, price, timestamp FROM product_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT rep_name, territory, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate > 0.1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT rep_name, territory, commission_rate FROM sales_representatives WHERE commission_rate >= 3.00 ORDER BY commission_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_prices pp JOIN sales_orders so ON pp.id = so.product_id WHERE pp.price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY pp.price DESC, so.quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_name FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000);
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM vendors INNER JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.product_id GROUP BY vendor_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
